archimate:Device.name: Office Multifunctional Printer (OMP)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Administrative offices (Accounts, HR, Finance, Procurement, Business Office) • General printing, copying, scanning documents, and occasional faxing.
Specifications:
• Print Speed: 30–40 pages per minute (ppm), black & white and color • Print Resolution: Minimum 600x600 dpi (color & black) • Scanner Resolution: Minimum 600x600 dpi optical • Copier Performance: Up to 30–40 ppm, includes duplex copying • Fax Capabilities: Integrated fax modem, PC fax option • Connectivity Options: Ethernet (network), USB, Wi-Fi, NFC tap-to-print (staff badge integration) • Paper Capacity: Minimum 500-sheet main tray, 100-sheet multipurpose bypass tray • Input/Output Tray Size: Standard Letter/A4, supports legal-sized paper • Energy Efficiency: ENERGY STAR certified, automatic sleep mode • Operating System Support: Windows 11, Windows 10, Windows Server • Protective Equipment: Dust-resistant printer cover, secure cable management, lockable paper trays • Security: PIN based or biometric protection for printing/retrieving prints. AES-256 encryption + HIPAA-compliant audit logs
